hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Green Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Game Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #3# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #7# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Ice Arrows# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #the Eyeball Frog#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Enemy Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #grave with a free chest#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #3# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial First Right Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Light Arrows#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ToT (Left).text: Gossip Stone Shuffle must be on. I'm normally in Zora's Domain!

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #a Wallet#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of time.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Light Arrows#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #the Serenade of Water#.
